title: Enhance PowerShell Profile with Starship, Zoxide, and Aliases
description: Update the PowerShell profile to integrate starship for a modern prompt, zoxide for smart navigation, and create aliases for modern tools like exa and bat. This improves the command-line experience.
comment: Enhanced the PowerShell profile with Starship, Zoxide, and aliases for exa and bat. The terminal must be restarted for changes to take effect.
